=== Edgy Eft knot 3 has been released! ===

On September 15, 2006 one more alpha version of upcoming Ubuntu, named Edgy Eft, has been <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-devel-announce/2006-September/000192.html|released]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
It includes a new bootup splash, Gnome 2.16, new login screen and <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/testing/knot3|more]]</nowiki> <<BR>> Knot 3 is availible for download <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/releases/edgy/knot-3/|here]]</nowiki> While developers are suggested to try this Knot, other users are warned that is is an alpha release and should not be used on production machines. The final release of Edgy Eft is scheduled to be released on October 2006.
